column4: why is ubuntu asking for a ubuntu 8.10 cd when I have 8.04 installed ?
during updates
k
remove the cd as a repository perhaps before you upgrade :)
install fusion-icon and emerald
fusion-icon will do all that for you
the controls are still missing
did you install emerald?
I tried fusion-icon and emerald --replace &
yes , I just did before I installed fusion-icon
oh wait sorry, I just replaced my window manager
fusion-icon probably does not see that emerald is installed
I seem to have controls now
sure
but why are my controls gone when I select compiz as my window manager?
compiz is only the window manager
you still need to pick a window decorator.. (metacity or emerald)
or kwin if you use kde
I have selected emerald as decorator
cool
also my desktop cube isnt working anymore :$
